EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for visiting Pivotal at Hadoop Summit in Brussels
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
If you missed Pivotal's keynote at Hadoop Summit in Brussels, the session described the Open Data Platform Initiative <http://opendataplatform.org/> (ODP) – a shared industry effort focused on promoting and advancing the state of open source big data technologies for the enterprise. A common ODP core – which anchors Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> – will help avoid vendor lock-in, simplify development of interoperable third-party technologies and, most importantly, reinforce the role of the Apache Software Foundation in the development and governance of upstream projects.
Check out this press release for additional information about the first milestone in Pivotal’s commitment to deliver ecosystem interoperability rooted in open source.
Want to learn how to be more open, agile and cloud-ready? Come see Pivotal in action at a Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow> or Pivotal Cloud Roadshow <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow> near you.
We look forward to seeing you at the next Hadoop Summit in San Jose <http://2015.hadoopsummit.org/san-jose/>!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
